sentences.en: All of it is growing alarmingly acidic, as the carbon dioxide spewed out by modern activities finds its way into the briny.
sentences.cn: 现代生产中喷涌而出的二氧化碳最终会融入了海水，海洋整体的酸化也令人担忧。

sentences.en: And now here he was hiding in the weeds outside Roanoke, Virginia, plotting a kidnaping.
sentences.cn: 而现在,在这儿,他则躲在弗吉尼亚州劳诺克市外的一块草地里, 密谋着一起绑架.

sentences.en: As sea - ice develops, the briny water beneath it cools to - 2 C.
sentences.cn: 随着海面冰层的形成, 冰层之下的海水温度低至 -2.

sentences.en: Development uses briny resource is to alleviate foreland lacks the way with water very active issue.

sentences.en: He adds that briny, acidic water would dissolve through alkaline basalt rock, not create puddles.
sentences.cn: 他认为那种盐水, 产生的酸会溶解碱性的玄武岩岩石, 不能产生水池.

sentences.en: He flies off with her , an apparent kidnaping, but is forced down in the desert.
sentences.cn: 祸不单行的是飞机发生故障而在沙漠上迫降, 两个冤家对头闹出的笑话就更大了.

sentences.en: In his whole miserable, messed - up life he'd never considered anything so callous as kidnaping.
sentences.cn: 在他悲惨 、 混乱的一生中,他从未想到过像绑架这样冷酷无情的事.

sentences.en: Natalie shuddered. " I don't know. It's a godforsaken place, Briny. "
sentences.cn: 纳塔丽耸耸肩膀. “ 我不知道,勃拉尼, 这是个荒凉的地方. ”

sentences.en: Prices of a large amount of fresh water variety fall slightly, briny product rises slightly.
sentences.cn: 大宗淡水品种价格略降, 海水产品略升.

sentences.en: That's self - preservation, not work. Briny's always been good at that.
sentences.cn: 那只是 自我 保存, 并不是工作--勃拉尼一向是善于那样的.

sentences.en: The briny water is not good for the growth of the trees.
sentences.cn: 海水不利于这种树木的生长。
